text: Alice J. Palmer (born June 20, 1939) is an American educator and politician who served as a member of the Illinois Senate. Known as a longtime progressive activist, Palmer represented the state's 13th Senate District from June 6, 1991, until January 8, 1997. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Indianapolis Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:Educators from Chicago Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from Indianapolis
title: Alice Palmer
